website_summaries.verdict: A high quality option in womens' leggings with a good fit and and comfortable fabric.
pros: Women loved the quality of the fabric on these leggings, which provided a good fit and overall structure as well as repelled pet hair and debris
They also get top marks for standing up well to washing, with no pilling
cons: Some felt the fabric was slightly too thin, and the sizing tends to run a bit small
A few felt they shows signs of wear too soon

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of cheap leggings, or any leggings, I’ve over purchased!
customer_reviews.text: I normally drop some cash on leggings because I crave quality. Sam Edelman, spanx, and Nordstrom Can’t hold a candle to these. Great quality, buttery soft, great fit, and so friggin cheap!! They run slightly long. A bit bunchy around the knees and ankles, not bad though. I’m a true size 12 (32 inch waist) I purchased a large and I’m very happy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: greatest game

customer_reviews.title: Buy these. Buy them right now.
customer_reviews.text: Buy these. Buy them right now. I ordered the small and the medium planning to return whichever pair didn't fit my daughter. I kept the medium for myself once I felt how incredibly thick and nice these are. Unlike many other brands of fleece tights, the inside of these stays LOVELY even after the wash (and the dryer by accident for my daughter's pair) AND they do NOT attract dog fur which is always winning in our house.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Moravec

customer_reviews.title: Amazing fit, warm, and stretchy!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these leggings. They fit perfectly and are SO warm! They’re very well made and stretchy in all the right places (yes squat proof). The moonlight color is really nice, it’s like a dark (almost black) blue, very pretty. I already have a black pair, I just wish they had more colors of these!!
customer_reviews.author: Beatrice Wong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect leggings!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'9 and 135 lbs. Typically I wear a size 2 in bottoms. I ordered a small and it fits perfect. Very stretchy and good quality material. Fits snug but room for squats and lunges. It's not super high waisted but sits right below my belly button. It has fleece lining but it's still breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Rose

customer_reviews.title: Not fleece lined just regular leggings
customer_reviews.text: So this was my second attempt at getting fleece lined leggings and sadly these were also a disappointment. The description says fleece lined but when they arrived they were NOT lined in fleece they were in fact just regular leggings. Sized small too so not much good I could say about these. Maybe it's good for others just not me. I am done searching for fleece lined leggings don't need a 3rd disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: E Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend, will likely purchase more.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely warmer than traditional leggings (too warm when I was vacuuming inside the house). These have a smooth silky finish on the outside and a soft fleece finish on the inside. Love the pockets on the side of the legs - big enough for my Moto Z3 with the case. They are long enough for my super long legs (35" inseam in jeans). There's some hold or compression which helps smooth out bumps. If they came one size larger I might be able to wear those but they probably wouldn't smooth out bumps as much. I have not used them for running or yoga, just walking, housework, and lounging so far.
customer_reviews.author: Tresa R, MN

customer_reviews.title: High waist, warm, mostly comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are a nice material (like my other 90 degree leggings). They are also thick, and soft and have kept me warm in 20 degree weather. I tried a pair of Bayleaf leggings at the same time, but I prefer the high waist of 90 degree. I am 5.6 and 125 lbs. I originally ordered a small, but had to exchange for an extra small because the waist wouldn't stay up and the fabric around the ankles was loose, which looked weird. The extra small fits better, but the waistband is quite snug and can be uncomfortable when seated. That's why I awarded 4 stars. Still, I am going to order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: KE

customer_reviews.title: I have been looking for a pair of warm leggings ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pair of warm leggings for the winter. I wear leggings most days to work and school but it is getting chilly and I need something more substantial than my go to cotton leggings. After reading the reviews that these run small, I got a large instead of medium, but in retrospect I think the medium would have fit well too. These leggings are certainly warmer than your standard leggings, but the lining is not as soft and cozy as I'd hoped.
customer_reviews.author: sophia

customer_reviews.title: One pair amaze, one pair not.
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve bought pairs of these leggings before without any issues. They lasted a long time, kept their shape and didn’t get all rough inside. But my last two pairs started pilling after the first wash and now after only a month of wear, they are yucky and the insides are all rough and uncomfortable. I’m gonna give it another go in case I got a bum batch but if this next pair do the same, I’m out fo’ life.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R.

customer_reviews.title: Gray ones ripped, black ones are great.
customer_reviews.text: I have these in black and gray. I am very happy with the black ones, but the seam on the gray ones started to fray after the first washing and has completely ripped open after the fourth washing. I have worn the black ones a ton with no problems. They are warm (for CA weather) and they never slide down.
customer_reviews.author: kt31416

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it at all
customer_reviews.text: I’m picky when it comes to leggings, being “fleece” lined I’m sure people are buying them for colder months. Jokes on you these are paper thin and will not hold up in winter or even fall. They aren’t warm at all. They also bunch up at the bottoms and I absolutely HATE when leggings do that. These are just extremely cheap, I will be returning as these are not at all what I was hoping they would be. Spend a few extra bucks and get a better pair.
customer_reviews.author: Breanna Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality
customer_reviews.text: I am super bummed about these leggings. I really wanted to like them; they're incredibly comfortable and they worked well on a cold-weather hike. However, I only got to wear them once before they started coming apart. I was very careful to wash them on a delicate cycle, and I also did not put them in the dryer, but the seam still came apart. For the price I paid, I am super disappointed in the product!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is too shiny!
customer_reviews.text: I was excited for these because I own a pair (without the fleece material) and they're perfect. I bought these in the black color and paid more than similar ones on this site; however, I returned them because they were too shiny and felt slick on my legs. Not like fleece.
customer_reviews.author: Marie

customer_reviews.title: I really like the look of these
customer_reviews.text: I really like the look of these, and they kept me warm while out hiking on a chilly morning. But they definitely run small! I am 5'7", 150 lbs. and can barely squeeze into a Large.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: Insufficient warmth
customer_reviews.text: I found these searching for leggings for warmth, but they failed to be warm on a 48 degree sunny day at a Thanksgiving parade. They have less compression that "yoga" leggings so I think I was actually colder in these leggings. I sized up and was sorry I did. They are not tight at the ankle so cold air travels up your leg when wearing short boots. They are okay for around the house, but are not for being outdoors in the cold for any length of time. Do not recommend for outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Correct fit and quality fabric and workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I seldom ever purchase active wear that is any other brand. All 90 Degree items I have purchased fit correctly. Between crops and full length leggings, I have at least 10 pair. Some are 3-4 years old and still fit and look like new even after being washed in the machine and dried in the dryer many, many times. They keep their shape after wearing all day long. The high waisted band makes them very comfortable when I working out at the gym, running errands around town, or just lounging around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I just want to wear them all the time
customer_reviews.text: Love these. I'm 5'2" 125lbs and usually wear a small or a size 2 jeans. I ordered a small and they fit perfectly. Although they are about 2 inches too long, but I just roll them/cuff them under.. I really wish they came in petite sizes. I'd be all over that. I bought these to wear on hikes in Alaska in the summer, they are definitely warmer than just regular yoga pants. The material is thick, but not bulky. Love the high waist and LOVE the compression around the waist! They don't show my mama of 3 pooch! I'm only sad I didn't buy these earlier
customer_reviews.author: message me

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Warm...Just too Shiny
customer_reviews.text: When I received these leggings, I immediately put them on. They are soooo warm. I am on a search for the perfect winter legging. These miss the mark for me. The do run a little small. I'm 5'4" 130lbs and the waist is a bit to tight. But I do hold some weight in my middle...old age spread. It's too bad that when I walked into the sunlight inside I noticed that they are shiny and showed all my lumps and bumps and I'm not at all flabby. The nice thing is with amazon Prime I sent the right back with no hassle. On the upside, they are very well made, and warm with the fleece lining.
customer_reviews.author: ju

customer_reviews.title: Comfy warm great fit
customer_reviews.text: Needed something to keep my legs warm outside for long stints at a time. With a lower back injury leggings are the only thing I can wear that won’t irritate my spine. I was skeptical as to how the fleece lined leggings would fit, hold up over time and how warm they would be. They fit great! Have worn them 5-6 times now and the fabric still stays in place. Only recommendation is do not dry in dryer, hang dry. Keep away from velcro. I am 165, 5’6”, normally wear a L/XL depending on the brand as I also have muscular legs. I ordered a L, in dark purple, going off of other reviews and the leggings fit great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Like These Leggings
customer_reviews.text: I ordered one of these to check them out. After wearing them around on a crisp day . . . I came back and ordered another pair. After xmas I will order several pair more. The fleece lining adds just enough thickness to keep you from thinking you've got bare legs out in the cold--they are NOT, however, intended for wear in very cold conditions. They are not windproof. They will not be warm enough. I really like the length--I'm 5'5" with maybe a 30" inseam, and lots of times leggings are just a wee bit too short to wear with booties. I don't have that problem with these. They come about down to the ankle bone.
customer_reviews.author: Rabid Reader

customer_reviews.title: Fab fleece leggings
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous fleece leggings. They don't sag throughout the day, they aren't see through at all, and they're nice and warm but not bulky. I've had cheaper fleece leggings that were awful in comparison and plan to buy more pairs of these for winter. These feel more durable than most other leggings I own, too. Only downside is I wouldn't wear them to work because they have a bit of a shine to them that looks more like athletic wear. I recommend buying your normal size or one size up if you're not sure because these don't have as much stretch as other leggings due to the fleece lining.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking but a tad long
customer_reviews.text: I really like these leggings- warm and look nice. I have had fleece lined leggings before and they tended to “pill” and look worn rather quickly. The only reason I didn’t give these 5 stars is they are a bit too long for me. I’m 5’3”; 137 lbs - I bought the medium based on previous reviews and they bunch up a little at the ankle- not enough for me to return them but enough to notice. They do fit snugly at the waist which I prefer so I don’t think the small would be a good option for me.
customer_reviews.author: ak

customer_reviews.title: Great but exterior fabric gets fuzzy/distorted
customer_reviews.text: This is my absolute favorite yoga/workout leggings.. high waisted luxury. I have many pairs of this brand and went head and got a fleece lined pair for my fall trip to Idaho. Love them. One downside is the fabric didn’t meet my standards.. while construction is as expected the exterior fabric became distorted when rubbed by other fabrics.. in my case my winter coat.
customer_reviews.author: Marivel M.

customer_reviews.title: soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these in Eden Green and Moonlit Ocean. I like both colors. The Eden Green edges toward a blue-green color and the Moonlit Ocean is a very verstile dark blue sightly more interesting than just navy. The "fleece" is simply means that the inside of the fabric is a brushed flannel like feel. It's not at all heavy weight or for sub-freezing weather. They fit snuggly but have lots of stretch. the ones I got are quite long and wrinkle up a bit on my legs even though I am 5'7'' and got the Large. Good product for the price-well sewn and look as good as any name brand.
customer_reviews.author: BlueMtGirl

customer_reviews.title: Size up- good for early/mild winter temps
customer_reviews.text: These fleece lined leggings aren’t very thick at all. I bought them to wear to take my dog for her walks in the winter, and it gets way below freezing where I live, so these won’t be enough on their own. I think these pants are great for those early winter months where the temp is about 40 degrees, unless you are just running errands and won’t be outside long. I’m 5’2 and had to roll them twice because they are kind of long for my short height. I’m usually a small but had to get a medium for these. Overall I’m keeping them for early winter and for layering.
customer_reviews.author: Lexie & Will

customer_reviews.title: They are ok
customer_reviews.text: They sent the wrong type of leggings. I had ordered the solid black without the pockets but ended up with a pair with pockets. They are long on me but I am only 5ft but normally that isn't a problem with leggings because I just fold the bottom under but these dont fit very tight at the bottom so when I fold them under it looks loose. Not a fan of the look but they are ok enough to keep when I just need to take my dogs outside to the park.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty comfy
customer_reviews.text: I just received these and they feel pretty warm and cozy. I am a true size 14 in pants and after reading some reviews, I bought an XL, but I think a L would have been fine and would have provided some compression. The XL is definitely long and a pretty loose in the legs. The high waist comes above the belly button. The very top of the waist does have a sort of tight, thin seam that would probably dig in a little if I'd bought the smaller size though, even if the rest of the legging would have fit properly.
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Warm and flattering
customer_reviews.text: This is my fourth pair of leggings from this brand and definitely by far my favorite brand of leggings. I was nervous ordering a S based on the reviews as my other pair are a small and definitely snug (but that’s how I look so great in them). They fit just like my others: a pair of capris and a pair of full length with pockets. And they are definitely warm! The only thing that I don’t absolutely love is the fabric- looking at it it’s almost like a sweatshirt material (the cheap kind) but I guess it’s the backing for the fleece? And no, it doesn’t attract dog hair which is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Single Mom of teens

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed!
customer_reviews.text: For reference - I wear a size 12, weigh about 165lbs (but haven't weighed myself in some time!) and am 5'2. I ordered a Large. They fit perfectly. A little long, but that doesn't bother me, they'll be tucked into boots anyway and it covers my ankles with different shoes. They thin so I was worried they wouldn't be warm, but you could tell the warmth as soon as you put them on. AND POCKETS. I love leggings with pockets!!
customer_reviews.author: Chantal

customer_reviews.title: Not flattering
customer_reviews.text: Hi I’m a 5’4 169 lbs girl I usually wear size medium in these leggings but if anyone wants them tight I would go w a small. And I ordered these because I’m a reflex lover. But these are not flattering :( The bottom leg is too wide too And they don’t form a good behind. Pros are they’re warm and the material is very comfortable and the color is beautiful I ordered the ruby color But wish they would be more like yoga pants. Tighter and more high waisted. They also don’t seem too have belly support.
customer_reviews.author: JASMIN

customer_reviews.title: Don't size up
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are fine. Many reviewer's said that The fleece lined leggings ran small, so I ordered up a size... And I regret doing that. I typically wear a medium, but a large if things run small, as I'm curvy. I ordered a large in these leggings, and they're Quite baggy on me. I kept them only because I needed to wear them right away, but they are awkwardly big. There was one day I was going to be out in the cold/snow for a while, so I layered two additional pairs of leggings underneath these leggings, and they started to approach fitting me. Basically don't size up, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the money!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a snowmobile trip, I wanted something comfortable for riding trails all day. These were awesome! I loved that they have pockets, just big enough for my hotel key card or my phone. These kept me plenty warm under my snowmobile pants, our temps ranged from about 15-40° F in the 2 days we went. The inside fleece lining is very soft. They fit just as expected-I normally wear a medium and they were right on. They are a higher waist which I like. Have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Hagel

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit for me
customer_reviews.text: I don’t even know what to write for the fit: the thighs and legs parts are quite big but the waist stomach part is more normal fitting. I have skinny legs so the large was way too big for me pretty much everywhere but when I ordered the medium the waist and stomach were quite tight but the thighs and legs were still scrunching up. Very strange fit for leggings. I think if you’ve got a small waist but have some junk in the trunk and thicker thighs then these would fit you very well. I sent both sizes back.
customer_reviews.author: Huszar

customer_reviews.title: Overrated
customer_reviews.text: Way overrated - I thought these would fit & feel fantastic based on the reviews. Meh, I have better leggings. I usually wear a Medium to a Large depending on the season (winter weight gain means my hips increase from 43” to maybe 45”+ ☺️). I bought these in a Large. First, the show every little bump & dip instead of smoothing over. I think they skimped on the inner lining. Secondly, they give easily instead of holding you in. Thirdly, the stitching & sheen on the fabric makes them look like workout leggings only which limits their versatility. I use mine for sleeping now so it was essentially wasting my money on fancy pajamas.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A

customer_reviews.title: Waist is small but the length is kickin
customer_reviews.text: The waist is ti-ight! I am a true 6, 5’7” & 145lbs) and the waist is super tight on the mediums. The length is great, pockets are amazing, fleecey warm inside and perfect for cold weather. My recommended size was a small. I am glad I sized up. A large probably would be fine as well. Ultimately I am keeping as I hope they will stretch over time and the rest of the fit is great. I am also in the process of losing just a little weight and hope this will fit perfectly at that point!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Lamb

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Let me start by saying that I absolutely love this brand for all my leggings. They’re made from thick but breathable materials that completely pass the squat test! I’m 5’7” and weigh 168lbs. I have an hourglass figure, but I definitely have a sizable rearend. I prefer to order these in large because I don’t like them too be too tight for everyday wear. The mediums fit my waist really well, but are too tight for comfort on my hips. Lastly, I live this fabric, it’s warm and a yet still breathable. However, this is definitely NOT fleece lined.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable But Came With A Hole
customer_reviews.text: Overall really like these leggings and this brand. I was looking for a warmer pair of leggings for the airplane so I bought these. The fleece is nice but I was expecting it to be thicker/softer. Not really noticeable but still comfortable and thicker than other pairs. Unfortunately when I opened the package they came with a small hole in the crotch...not going to attempt to return them as I live abroad, so I'll try to stitch them up....I am 5"8 & 130 lbs and they fit perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best fleece leggings
customer_reviews.text: I have to review these because typical fleece leggings are the worst. Let’s be honest. They don’t stretch correctly, have too much fleece, and are uncomfortable. These are not that. These are amazing. Just a tiny amount of fleece to keep you warm and they still feel like all my other leggings. Snug and stretchy all while keeping everything in place. I love these. I bought the wine color with pockets in a medium. Color is gorgeous. Fit is right. I’m 5’3” and 129 lbs with a slight hourglass figure.
customer_reviews.author: LLMCC

customer_reviews.title: Run Small
customer_reviews.text: These seemed to be well made and warm, BUT they run even smaller than expected! Based on reviews, I sized up to a large and they were still way too small to even try to put on all the way. For reference, I wear a size 8 in Express jeans. I purchased the Baleaf fleece lined pants in a large and those fit me great. These were returned.
customer_reviews.author: Julia R.

customer_reviews.title: Love the fit
customer_reviews.text: Love all f 90 degree leggings. My favorite of all. They feel so good on my legs. Are not see through at all and they stay up great. Wish they made a petite length for short people though. The Capri aren’t long enough for the winters and the regular length is to long. I have to scrunch them at my ankles.
customer_reviews.author: Sheri N.

customer_reviews.title: Measurements not exact
customer_reviews.text: They fit mostly fine, except for one leg being about 3" longer than the other leg. They're comfy and I really need them for work this week because it's cold here so, I'm going to keep them. I'm hoping I can just kinda bunch them up and it won't be noticable. The waist is also really high for me, it comes above my belly button but, that's pretty normal. I knew they were high waisted and I'm short waisted so everything is high. They're probably pretty normal for most people. But seriously, wtf?
customer_reviews.author: Beth W

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are indeed warmer and thicker than regular leggings, comfortable, and the fit is good. I have worn them since December and washed about 5-6 times now. Seams have faded considerably (I only wash leggings, especially black, inside out in cold water and hang dry) and pocket pilled up. Picture shows this and, yes, I took this after a walk with the dog who sheds. Also, there is a seam down the front of your leg, so not good for anything but outdoor/sports. Would I buy again? No.
customer_reviews.author: Jeda

customer_reviews.title: Exact same fit as my other 90 degree leggings!
customer_reviews.text: Since 90 degree leggings are my go to legging I have quite a few pairs and I’m consistently a size large in every pair/style. I was worried with the other reviews that ordering my normal size would yield bad results with these fleece leggings but I was very pleasantly surprised this morning when I tried them on and they fit perfectly. They are the exact same fit as every other pair I own. The interior material feels nice and not too heavy and they have constructed the leggings so there isn’t any awkward seaming or pulling which I find in most fleece undergarments. Can’t wait to wear these!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not warm
customer_reviews.text: Liked the pattern and the pockets. However, the length was a little long for my 5' frame, and I don't care for the forward seaming detail (didn't notice it in the picture before I bought it). But my biggest gripe is that they're not warm. If you're only going from the car into a store and it's at least 50 degrees, fine. But I walk in the early morning, and they are no where near as warm as a pair I got from a different vendor. Wish someone would make a cute an actually warm pair of pants for those of us who exercise in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: STL Woman

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfy, and POCKETS!!!
customer_reviews.text: Why am I just now finding out about fleece lined leggings!?! These things are amazing!!! I bought them mostly for lounging, but they’d be great as cold weather workout leggings also. I bought both the small and medium as some reviews stated that there wasn’t much stretch, but the small fit perfectly with plenty of give. (I normally buy small leggings). 5 stars for comfort, 10 stars for POCKETS!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was hoping for
customer_reviews.text: This product fits as expected. I’m 5’6” 125 lbs and typically wear a size 2, I ordered a small and the length and waist fit perfectly. My issue is with the quality of the material... I would expect these to be thick considering they’re fleece lined but they are very thin. I ordered the black, tried them on with black underwear and they were definitely see-through. I didn’t even need to do a full squat to be able tell, just looked in the mirror and it was obvious on both the sides and back. Will be returning as I have no need for leggings that can’t provide basic coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice but not as warm as expected
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I’m a little disappointed in these pants. I like them a lot but I was expecting them to be more well fleece lined. I though they would be a good thing to have for the winter and while I do like them and the pockets are cool to have I was hoping they would be warmer. Still a good pair of leggings though I’ll probably have to fine something to wear either on top or over them.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz93

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT ALL-DAY COLD WEATHER LEGGINGS
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are THE BEST for active days in cold weather. They flatter my figure with the fitted waist, and are long enough (I’m 5’9”). The fleece lining is subtle, but enough to make a huge difference in cold weather. Paired with winter socks, boots, and a heavy jacket I’m ready to go. The pockets are an added bonus. It’s large enough to fit my iPhone snugly... it never falls out. I have tried to order other fleece lined leggings in packs of 3 or 5 and the quality doesn’t compare. I will only order these from now on. 100% worth paying a tad extra.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Pope

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and comfort
customer_reviews.text: When these arrived I thought, "No way these are going to fit -- they're tiny!" But they do fit and are very comfortable. I wear them around the house daily. The pockets are handy for carrying my phone and glasses. They are a nice mid-weight. Not too warm for inside and not too thin with a fleecy texture inside. They have held up to washing and my rowdy kittens with minimal wear. Overall a great value.
customer_reviews.author: wata

customer_reviews.title: love these fleece leggings
customer_reviews.text: From the other reviews I bought a large because I read they ran a little bit small. I think they are more true to size and wish I would have bought a medium. The large is fine but I don't feel very supported in them. They aren't baggy but just kind of "there". I like leggings to feel a bit more supportive, my preference. I love the navy blue and the fleece is soft altho they aren't super heavy, just enough to wear alone for cool temps or as a layer under something for cold temps
customer_reviews.author: Lori Nowaski

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm for a trip to the Grand Canyon in February
customer_reviews.text: I bought these upon a recommendation from a blogger I follow, and they did not disappoint! Thanks to Amazon and 90 Degree By Reflex they arrived in 2 days via Prime--just in time to head out of town. Perfect in so many ways - 1) Light and packable 2) Great fit (I am 5' 8" and they comfortably extended from waist to top of foot) 3) Warm in 30-40 degree temps for a few hours, and 4) Quality product. I will wear these all winter here in TN for walking, too. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AbbyL

customer_reviews.title: Great leggings!!
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted some basic, fleece-lined leggings for the winter. These are perfect & I’m going into my second season wearing them without any noticeable wear & tear. Based on other reviews I sized up & I’m glad I did. I’m 5’6 ~160lbs and I’m usually a large in other leggings (target, old navy, american apparel) but got an XL in these and they work great. The texture is that nice slight shiny/sheen that athletic leggings have as opposed to the matte texture of cotton leggings. If that’s what you’re going for I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for an hourglass, but squat-proof
customer_reviews.text: It basically fit as expected, in that I think it seems like the correct volume for the size as it was labeled. But if your waist is smaller than your hips I think it'll be a problem. I'm returning mainly because it fit me everywhere except my waist. The waist was way too big and I think it would all just slide down if I kept them and tried to walk any distance in them. Also, there is a seam right down the front and the gusset/crotch triangle was pretty far back. A recipe for cameltoe. Anyway, I returned them. The good parts were that the fleece seemed pretty nice and you couldn't see through them when I squatted.
customer_reviews.author: NoName

customer_reviews.title: Meh, not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’ and currently 118lbs (3months pregnant), and got the small. The fit is weird around the torso area and extremely long. I’m in a serious need of fleece pants so I decided to take a chance on these. Comfort- not bad. Look wise- less than ideal. Product expectations- like some other reviewers mentioned, the black is super shiny in the day time. I tried these on indoors and thought the color was fine(black). Once I walked outside, I was upset at how reflective it was. Since I already wore it, can’t return it.
customer_reviews.author: Mup

customer_reviews.title: Very soft, a little on the short side. Order a size up
customer_reviews.text: Excuse the messy bathroom. Anyway, these leggings are pretty nice, thick material and soft. The only cons I can think of is I wish they were longer, but I'm 5'8" with long legs so not everything goes past my ankles! I also normally wear a medium in bottoms, so that's what I ordered, but they are somewhat tight and I think a large would have fit better on my body type.
customer_reviews.author: L

customer_reviews.title: Thick leggings. Perfect for cold weather.
customer_reviews.text: I just received my order today. I bought 2 fleece lined leggings from 2 different companies. After trying both of them on, I've decided to keep this one & return the other. The reason I'm keeping this one is because the waistband did not roll down. That's a common problem for me when it comes to shapewear. This legging is thick, warm & has a great support. I haven't worn it for a long period, so time will tell if the waistband will stay supportive. I'll update after giving it a true test run.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for chilly weather
customer_reviews.text: Love the warmth of these leggings. These were purchased for the outdoors. I walk all winter and use these as much as possible. Depends on wind and temperature, but they extend my walks without the two layers. When really cold, I use thin leggings and a heavy ski pants layer, but these are a greatest between regular daily leggings and two layers. Light compression, nice fleece, made for cold. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Warm. Stylish. Great fit.
customer_reviews.text: This is the only brand leggings I wear, I have about 8 Pair. Found these fleece lined pair for my trip to Switzerland and France in 30-40 degree weather. Wow. These held up just as well as all the other 90degree leggings I own. The Fleece lining kept me warm. Super comfortable as I went sightseeing and exploring all over! High waist is super comfortable and not too tight! Once again this brand has hit the mark!!
customer_reviews.author: nicole n

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but not good quality
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair like this that I bought from TJ maxx size XL that I love. I wanted another pair exactly like it. I did my research and from the description thought this was a match. When this arrived, it looked great but felt thinner. After trying it on, it felt more like a size L and after one day of wear, it started pilling. Still pilling after the second and third time wearing. The previous pair that I’ve had for a year is not pilling at all on the outside. I am disappointed with the quality because other 90 degrees pants that I own are high quality.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: My favorite leggings ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these leggings!! By far my number 1 favorite and go to leggings for winter from now on!!! I will be buying more next winter!!! They are so warm and comfortable!! I’m not a fan that they only have high waisted option but I just roll the waist part down. They are on the pricey side but it’s definitely 100% worth it!!! They have ones just like these but with pockets and I highly recommend getting both pairs!! I have 2 sets with pockets and 2 sets without pockets that’s how much I love these leggings!! Highly highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Freiburger

customer_reviews.title: Active leggings
customer_reviews.text: I’m not really a fan of the material but they’re super comfy. I don’t like how the ankles are a bit too big. I think it’s just my mistake. I’m sure I got a size too big. I ordered the afitne leggings and they fit me better. I’m also more of a fan of the cotton feel to them. I wish they had this and more colors in the afitne leggings. I’m looking for a grey pair next. Big thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: isabella

customer_reviews.title: Fit, color and pockets are perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are super comfy and trendy. I love the deep color, tummy control and pockets on the sides. When I first put them on I thought I got duped because they did not feel like fleece at all but it is just a very thin fleece. I still think they are pretty perfect. I suggest taking the "what size should I get quiz?" I am 5'4" about 120lbs with slight muscular legs and it suggested a small which seems to fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Keldeville

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are so comfortable and cozy! I will be living in them this winter. Already purchased a second pair. I am small and wear a small but I bought a medium because I don’t like things skin tight and I like the medium- the length is good and it doesn’t make me feel too sucked in. I think the small would be fine too. I can’t imagine anyone disliking these.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Fit, Color
customer_reviews.text: They are warmer, but they don't have typical fleece inside. They are very comfortable. I'm size 8/10 and 5'5", and size large worked out great. A little long for me, but fine with tennis shoes. The high waist does not roll down. The royal plum is a beautiful color. I got them without pockets, so they can easily be used as leggings under a short dress or long top.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good fit but pocket NOT as described at all - disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this pair five stars if it had the pockets it advertised. I specifically ordered the pair with pockets as I was going to the airport to WI and wanted the ability to put things in my pocket while on the move. The pair I got had one tiny “pocket” at the top (like most traditional leggings/work out pants) NOTHING like what is pictured. My phone definitely wouldn’t fit, and it’s just a small opening at the top - not on the side as pictured. Very disappointed. The fit is fine and they are warm - but I realized too late the missing pocket. :(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rynn

customer_reviews.title: High waist that doesn't roll down
customer_reviews.text: I love these!!! I ordered a size up so my tummy wouldn't get pinched. The top does not roll down, and they fit real well. They have a lot of stretch to them, and yet, they have a lightweight fleece lining. I get chilled wearing them when it's 50 or colder outside, so mostly, I'd plan on wearing these indoors. They also snag rather easily, but they are well-made. I really like them, esp since they have plus sizes. I will probably order another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Deep Forest

customer_reviews.title: Thick tight and confortsble
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are really comfortable and the material is thick. Nothing worse than thin loose leggings. I have ordered many pairs over the last couple years, and continue to come back to them when I need new pairs. Just so easy to have them delivered to my door and I know they will fit. When I first bought them they were around $20. And then they crept up to $25, and I just paid $30 for this pair. Not too happy that the prices keep increasing. As long as they stay in the $30 and under price range I will continue to order them.
customer_reviews.author: Mandi ewart

customer_reviews.title: My favorite leggings!
customer_reviews.text: These are my absolute favorite leggings. I just ordered a 2nd pair in a large, my others are XL. I’m a size 14 in jeans, but I have a muffin top and hate when leggings roll down. These stay put. They are warm and very comfy. I have a horse and these are my go to for barn work and riding. Better quality and cheaper than most inexpensive riding pants I’ve bought. And I love the pockets on the legs!
customer_reviews.author: Tracy M

customer_reviews.title: Go with your usual size for this brand
customer_reviews.text: I payed attention to the reviews saying that they ran big and ordered up, getting a medium rather than my usual small. I had to send them back and get the small instead. I am 5'2" and 125 for your reference and I found them too baggy. So that's just my opinion, but I thought I'd share it for those of you who pay attention to these sort of reviews.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Grammy of 5

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: These are the most comfortable pants. I never want to take them off. I'm serious. Haha. Not the best picture, sorry. These fit true to size. I'm 5'4" and 130lbs. I normally wear a size 8 pants or I'm a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable and love the length
customer_reviews.text: So I have never worn leggings before and thought I'd give them a try. So comfy! I see now why everyone wears them-- altho some shouldn't. These are very comfortable, love the high waist as it sucks my stomach in and love the long length. Only thing, I usually wear a med and the elastic on the very top cuts me off when I sit down so should've gotten a large.
customer_reviews.author: Loo

customer_reviews.title: Not as nice as the other 90 degree brand leggings. Hideous and awy
customer_reviews.text: I have other leggings of the 90 degree brand and I love them. These however, are hideous. Shiny , short and weirdly tight in all the wrong places. Awful is the only way to describe them. Simply awful .
customer_reviews.author: former hokie

customer_reviews.title: Warm, But not for 30 degree weather
customer_reviews.text: I really like the feel of these leggings. I did size up and went with a large. Usually wear a medium. I'm 5'3" and wear a size 10. They were warm, but not warm enough by themselves in Colorado 30 degree weather.
customer_reviews.author: Vic2323

customer_reviews.title: Nice for everyday wear but not for running
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to run in during the winter in Ohio. I tend to be a very warm runner and so far I have been comfortable in them in temps as low as 10-20 degrees. The pockets are great and I am able to put my iPhone 8 and snacks in ther with plenty of room. My only complaint is they slowly and annoyingly slide down during my runs. However, even though they didn’t work for running they have been great to wear out and about.
customer_reviews.author: SoonerMom1

customer_reviews.title: Cozy cozy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these leggings to keep me warm on my recent visit to NYC. They were perfectly cozy and comfy. I went a size up from the recommended size because of the reviews, and I really should’ve stuck with the actual recommended size instead. It worked out regardless since I I wore boots but the gathering from the extra material on the legs wouldn’t of happened if I got my actual size. Moral of the story: these are true to size don’t size up
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Soooo comfy... wish they didn't pill...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two pair of these and while they are a little too athletic looking to wear as part of an actual outfit, they are RIDICULOUSLY comfortable. The problem is that within an hour of my putting them on, the front of the legs started to pill. I had them on with a super soft (loose) t-shirt and nothing that would have caused any friction to take place. As I've washed them and worn them more, they've done this in a lot of other places. It was too late to return them, and it's super disappointing b/c these may be the most comfortable leggings I've ever worn.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small, no stretch
customer_reviews.text: I own several pairs of XL leggings from this brand, but these leggings were definitely way too small due to a lack of stretch. I struggled to get these over my hips and even bent back my thumb nail in the process. And they don’t offer an XXL in the color I’d like so I’ll have to return these and search for a pair with another brand.
customer_reviews.author: RachelG

customer_reviews.title: Overall Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not sheer, very warm. These are comfy but fit me weird. I’m 5’1, 100lbs and the small was too tight on my waist. Baleaf actually has a much more comfortable fit so I went with those. Hope this is helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!! Great for winter hiking! Great Fit for Tall Girl!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these leggings! They fit like a dream, are super comfortable and soft on the inside, and even the pockets are insulated! I am currently participating in the 52 Hike Challenge and these leggings have been great for keeping me warm on cold, winter hikes. Also, I'm 5'10" with long legs and these are the perfect length for me! No complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: Hey ladies,  get these. They're awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, have 3 pairs now. Ordered my usual leggings size (1st pair purchased a size larger *medium * but found that i didn't need to and re purchased in my usual size small ) the leggings are a great fit, stay up, and DON'T have an annoying thin elastic band at the waist. These are great and warm and i love them and wear often during colder weather.
customer_reviews.author: barbara basinger

customer_reviews.title: Fleecy winning yoga pant perfection.
customer_reviews.text: These yoga pants/leggings are so warm & comfortable. They may not be enough if you’re looking for fleece lined pants to keep you warm up in snowy Northern climates, but when the weather is bouncing around from 30-60-40-75 here in the South, it’s nice to have these to pull on for days when I’m feeling wimpy, and working out and/or not wanting to wear real pants! A must buy, and running true to size.
customer_reviews.author: AES

customer_reviews.title: Definitely workout leggings, not for dress
customer_reviews.text: These fit great but looked too much like workout leggings to wear anywhere but the gym. Too many seams. I returned and purchased a seamless pair that I can wear anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Z.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: I got these yoga pants for winter wear. I am 5"6" and 175 lbs. I got the XL and they are too big, a bit lose over all, and baggy around my ankles. They are actually a good 2" too long. The pants are very nice though, great deep color, cozy and warm, and I will keep them as I was only going to wear them inside anyway. I like them a lot, but if you are my size, go Large not XL. ;)
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Size Up if you are on the cusp on the size guide
customer_reviews.text: I followed the size guide and ordered the medium. I am normally a size 8 in most things. The medium size said it would fit if you are an 8-10. The large said 10-12-14, so I thought those would be too big. The medium ended up being too tight for overall comfort, so would recommend possibly sizing up if you are a “big 8”. Overall quality was good - I’ve got others in this brand and they wear well.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Love the fleece lined.
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 4. Ordered a small. Fits well, mayyybe a tiny tiny bit large, but not enough to bother me at all. Haven’t tried them while running, yet, so I don’t know if they will slide being a tiny bit big. On the other hand, they are perfect when the weather is a bit chilly. I’m always cold and these are now my favorites.
customer_reviews.author: Reviewer29109

customer_reviews.title: Great for tall curvy girls!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" with a 36" inseam, I ordered an XL. They went to my ankles! I'm so happy I found a pair that went past mid calf. They were high waisted and never folded over while bending. So comfortable! The only thing I wasnt as excited a out with the fleece inside feels a little cheap. I'm hoping it doesnt pill up. I will update my review if it does.
customer_reviews.author: K D

customer_reviews.title: Did not live up to expectations
customer_reviews.text: I bought based on reviews and my thoughts: 1. Wore it at low 40 degrees and my legs did not feel warm, I think the fleece is thin, the material felt thin. I own a fleece lined leggings bought from costco which is much warmer tha this. 2. It ripped a small hole on my 1st wear, 3. Fit a bit big, and not for petites, I'm 5'1" size 10 (38-33-40 measurement) and leggings had some folds, it is probably more my preference than sizing but I like my leggings snug to fit. Had to return, amazon returns are amazing though.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Vallejos

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand! However I did not keep these because the outside lining was not a cotton type material I was looking for. It was a polyester type material and I wanted something I could wear to the office with tunics that didn’t exactly look like work out pants. These are definitely super warm. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Heather T.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for this 5'10" lady!
customer_reviews.text: I'm 5'10" and 149 lbs. I sized up as recommended and I'd say these fit just fine in the legs and are slightly loose in the waist, but not horribly so. The length is perfect, so I don't know what other commenters mean when they say they run short (and those commenters are shorter than me!). I probably could've taken a size medium, but the large works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Great winter tights
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for some winter tights that were a) warm b) stay up when being active c) look good and d) didn't cost a fortune ...I took a chance on these because they had free return shipping if needed. No need to send them back. They are great. They stay up really well and are cozy warm (but not too warm!). I got the ones with the pockets, and I love that for when I'm just out walking, I can put my phone in there. I got a very dark blue color, and they are just as flattering as a black pair but a little different than your standard black.
customer_reviews.author: Ski Hound

customer_reviews.title: Not for Short People
customer_reviews.text: I like that these leggings are warm and I love the colors. What I disliked was the length of the legs. I am 5’1” tall and they are about 3” too long plus the ankle area is not fitted enough.
customer_reviews.author: Poppins

customer_reviews.title: Thin Polartec lining is warm, but doesn't make your legs look larger!
customer_reviews.text: I love 90 Degree leggings with the wide waistband that holds your tummy, but they run tight. I usually get a Medium but had to return and get a large. I am 5'5 and weigh 129. M was way tight around the middle - large is a tiny bit loose but way more comfortable! Someone ask about being pregnant - no way! Get maternity leggings. ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Donna L

customer_reviews.title: impressive leggings!
customer_reviews.text: These leggings are awesome! The quality exceeds my expectations, the fit and styling are perfect and would rival the big name brands Nike, Under Armor, etc. As much as I love these though, I can't recommend them for indoor workouts, since they are pretty warm- I would use them for biking outside when it its the 40's or a bit cooler. I'll be keeping an eye on this brand to buy other items from them.
customer_reviews.author: Karin

customer_reviews.title: Nice & thick
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 90 degrees leggings for years now. I bought my usual size XS and they fit perfect. They actually are very warm, kind of like wearing 2 pairs of leggings. My expectations weren't high because they are leggings, they are meant to be thin. But out of all of the pairs I have from 90 degrees these are very warm and thick. Will buy again :)
customer_reviews.author: T. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Cozy but would not exercise in them or wear them a long time
customer_reviews.text: These fit as expected, TTS, and the lining, of course, makes them cozy. But the waistband is not a smooth wide band like most leggings. It is thin and thick so feels "round" and cuts into my waist even though the waist is not tight. I would not wear them all day or to exercise in. They are lined but that does not correlate to being any warmer than other leggings. I wear them around the house for a short period but that is it. I would not purchase them again.
customer_reviews.author: Vikki K Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Like compression hose
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a small, as was recommended by size chart. They were like compression hose, and the top of the waist band felt like it was cutting me in half. I really like how they felt and they were toasty (day on the couch wearing them to see if I could handle how tight they were). I have returned these for a medium, hope the size up won't get baggy, but I don't see how it could.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer H.

customer_reviews.title: strange pair of leggings
customer_reviews.text: felt like they were too small but they did stretch out as the day went on. I own some other 90 degree stuff and the size small stuff is usually too big so I thought I'd be safe ordering a small considering they are bulkier but oh well. The crotch inseam is a bit wonky so I won't be able to wear these without a tunic covering the lady bits because it looks weird.
customer_reviews.author: A. Silveira

customer_reviews.title: Cozy, but not my fav.
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’4, 138lbs. I usually wear a size medium. These were on the longer side, and bunched a bit on the ankle. While they were super soft and cozy, overall they fit a little looser than I liked. Maybe the size small would have fit better but I also didn’t love the stitching running vertical down the leg. Not a design “flaw” but personal preference.
customer_reviews.author: NRobinson

customer_reviews.title: Cute and semi warm
customer_reviews.text: Although warmer than the normal leggings, I wouldn’t recommend these alone for really cold climates, but they do work great as a bottom layer. 3 pockets is great. The side pockets will hold an iPhone without it flying out when running or doing upside down yoga poses. I’m quite happy with these leggings.

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered 3 pairs of the same exact leggings and didn’t have a problem until the 3rd pair. I love the previous 2 but this pair is cut differently. They are much longer, way too tight around the waist and have very little stretch to them. They are so uncomfortable. I had already taken the tags off and packed them for a trip since I assumed it would be the exact same fit as the other 2, not realizing until on said trip when I put them on how wrong I was. Truly disappointed as I had finally found a pair of leggings I loved! Now it feels like a gamble to order them and they aren’t the cheapest.
customer_reviews.author: Private

product_meta.title: 90 Degree By Reflex High Waist Fleece Lined Leggings - Yoga Pants
feature_bullets: POCKET OPTION. These brushed fleece leggings offer your preference of pockets or no pockets. Bulky purses and heavy backpacks are a thing of the past with our winter leggings. Open pockets allow for easy access to your belongings, while compartments provide security to ensure your personal items stay in place. The pockets can fit your smartphone, wallet, or car keys so you can focus on your workout.

HIGH WAISTBAND. Our women’s yoga leggings have a stretchy high waist elastic waistband with a 4 ½“ rise that covers the navel. Made from a blend of 88% Polyester and 12% Spandex, these leggings are highly elastic and ultra-comfortable. Ideal for exercising outside or everyday wear, these fleece leggings are a must-have for your cold gear collection. Compare your hip, waist and inseam measurements with our size guide to help you determine the perfect size for you! Approximate model size (S).

FLEECE LINED INTERIOR. Perfect for skiers, ice skaters, or outdoor runners, these women’s 28" leggings have a brushed fleece interior to provide warmth. Designed to feel like wearing your favorite sweatshirt on your legs, the interior of our warm leggings will pair perfectly with your winter coat for your morning jogs. Whether you’re participating in winter sports or relaxing at home by the fireplace, these are the perfect winter leggings that make great Christmas presents or holiday gifts.

TRUSTWORTHY, WELL-LOVED BRAND. 90 Degree by Reflex is an activewear brand that takes pride in our products which offer the utmost comfort, fit, performance, and fashion. Our high quality active apparel is an amazing value, ideal for gym enthusiasts and for everyday wear. We are Amazon’s #1 Seller of athletic leggings, so we can guarantee that you’ll receive a quality product. Customers rave about our products, and the reviews speak for themselves.

30-DAY MONEY BACK WARRANTY. 90 Degree by Reflex’s activewear can be returned for any reason with a 30-day, full-refund guarantee. Click the "Add-to-Cart" button to add this item to your cart and purchase it right away. Due to high demand and popularity, we rapidly run out of merchandise, so order now while your favorite colors and styles last.
